#summary xml-matcher Distributions
#labels Featured

= Maven =

Add the following dependency to your POM.

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.xmlmatchers</groupId>
  <artifactId>xml-matchers</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-RC1</version>
</dependency>
}}}

Versions [http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|org.xmlmatchers|xml-matchers|1.0-RC1|jar 1.0-RC1] and [http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|org.xmlmatchers|xml-matchers|0.10|jar 0.10] are currently available in Maven Central. See [http://search.maven.org/#browse|-1724894730 Maven Central Search] for all versions available in Maven Central.

= Non-Maven =

Download the latest version from from the [http://code.google.com/p/xml-matchers/downloads/list download page].  

xml-matchers depends on [http://code.google.com/p/hamcrest/ Hamcrest]  (hamcrest-core) version [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/hamcrest/hamcrest-core/1.3/hamcrest-core-1.3.jar 1.3]. If you are using the XML "equivalence" features, [http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/ XML-Unit] version [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/xmlunit/xmlunit/1.3/xmlunit-1.3.jar 1.3] is also required.
